messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] race car driver
messages.messageBody:
<<<<[my 2yo dd has been interested in race car driving since
october when she wanted to dress up like one for halloween.
any ideas to expose her more to this are of interest?]>>>>

There is a Disney Channel movie about a girl who becomes a race car driver
in kid races, overcoming various obstacles I guess (based on a true story) -
I haven't watched it, just seen the trailers. It may not be of interest to
your 2yo, but it might give you some further ideas.

Robyn L. Coburn

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] race car driver
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/5/2005 10:33:43 A.M. Eastern Standard Time, ahclarke@wowway.com writes: any  ideas to expose her more to this are of interest? I just got
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/5/2005 10:33:43 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,
ahclarke@... writes:

any ideas to expose her more to this are of interest?


I just got a cute sound book called Nascar Track Sounds by Futech
Interactive ISBN 1-58224-020-5.

It has a little wheel on each page that you push and get sounds of racing...
of course I bought the book for me since it has Jeff Gordan on it. My kids
just laugh.

Also Nascar.com has all kinds of pictures and info. Not only do they have a
college but I just read they are starting to recruit women and minorities so
there you go. <g>

Dorothy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

In a message dated 1/5/2005 10:33:43 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,
ahclarke@... writes:

my 2yo dd has been interested in race car driving since october when she
wanted to dress up like one for halloween. any ideas to expose her more to this
are of interest?<<<<

Two years old? <g> I know there's a NASCAR college in Charlotte, NC! <g> She
might have to wait a few years though! <g>

~Kelly
